name: Hanoi Vegan Local Food Tour
description: Coming to Hanoi and researching about local cuisine? Pho, bun cha, banh mi, and all that exciting stuff. What if you are vegan or vegetarian, and you don’t want to compromise your values while experiencing local culture? Don’t worry - Hanoi cuisine has so many hidden charms that allow you to fully enjoy a compassionate trip. From sweet desserts, drinks to main dishes, follow a local expert and a vegan expert to enjoy the real taste of this city and chat about local culture, traveling experiences, and more. Everything is vegan and eco-friendly!
